column1: The Roman Catholic Diocese of Guanhães (Latin: Dioecesis Guanhanensis) is a diocese located in the city of Guanhães in the Ecclesiastical province of Diamantina in Brazil.

column2: 1985: Established as Diocese of Guanhães from the Metropolitan Archdiocese of Diamantina
column3: Diocese of Governador Valadares and Diocese of Itabira–Fabriciano

column1: Emanuel Messias de Oliveira (14 January 1998 Appointed - 16 February 2011 Appointed
=== Other priests of this diocese who became bishops ===

column2: appointed Bishop of São Luíz de Cáceres
